Class AuthenticationException

java.lang.Object

      java.lang.Exception

              org.springframework.core.NestedRuntimeException

                      org.springframework.security.AuthenticationException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AccountStatusException, AuthenticationCancelledException, AuthenticationCredentialsNotFoundException, AuthenticationServiceException, BadCredentialsException, ConcurrentLoginException, InsufficientAuthenticationException, NonceExpiredException, NtlmBaseException, OpenIDAuthenticationRequiredException, PreAuthenticatedCredentialsNotFoundException, ProviderNotFoundException, RememberMeAuthenticationException, SessionAlreadyUsedException
public abstract class AuthenticationException
extends SpringSecurityException

Abstract superclass for all exceptions related an Authentication object being invalid for whatever reason.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
Ben Alex
